org.apache.ignite.logger.log4j

Class Log4JFileAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      • org.apache.log4j.WriterAppender
        • org.apache.log4j.FileAppender
          • org.apache.ignite.logger.log4j.Log4JFileAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler

    public class Log4JFileAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.FileAppender
    Log4J FileAppender with added support for grid node IDs.
